controls.name: percentileIndex
controls.caption: Percentile index (0..8)
controls.description:
Index of percentile in square 3x3. Value 4 means the median, 8 the maximum (dilation), 0 the minimum (erosion).
Note: this function uses simple cyclic continuation mode. Other modes and other pattern shapes (besides 3x3 square) are available in the morphology "Percentile" function.

controls.name: specialAlgorithmWhenPossible
controls.caption: Special algorithm when possible
controls.description: If set, this function uses a special algorithm for a case of the percentiles 0 (erosion) 4 (median) and 8 (dilation). It improves performance.
